questions.question: By default, the Generic Reader can handle datasets with different feature types.
The Generic Reader does not contain parameters settings for the various formats. This can be overcome by:
options: It can't be overcome. Default reader format parameters are always used.
Adding a Reader as a Resource, and set parameters there.
Adding a ParameterFetcher transformer to the workspace.

questions.question: What must be done to allow the Generic Reader to handle datasets with different feature types?
options: Nothing. Variations in feature types will be handled automatically.
Add a FeatureMerger transformer to the Canvas.
Turn on the Merge Feature Type parameter (with a wildcard) in the feature type properties.
